perturbation.original_text: The total sum of non-paid invoices (estimated to be approximately $80,000) payable to Marv Enterprises, LLC, previously owed by Premier to Marv up until the effective date of this Agreement, payable in total by no later than July 20, 2020.
perturbation.changed_text: The total sum of non-paid invoices (estimated to be approximately $80,000) payable to Marv Enterprises, LLC, previously owed by Premier to Marv up until the effective date of this Agreement, payable in total by no later than August 15, 2020.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the outstanding invoices from July 20, 2020, to August 15, 2020. This directly contradicts section 2(e) which states the original date, creating uncertainty about which date is valid. If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 2(b) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier.
perturbation.contradicted_text: (e) If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 2(b) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier.

perturbation.original_text: $750,000, payable to THI in total by no later than June 20 , 2020. The payment will be for developing fluorescently-conjugated antibodies in the Field of Covid-19 Treatments.
perturbation.changed_text: $750,000, payable to THI in total by no later than July 5 , 2020. The payment will be for developing fluorescently-conjugated antibodies in the Field of Covid-19 Treatments.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the $750,000 payment from June 20, 2020, to July 5, 2020. This directly contradicts section 3(e) which states the original date, creating uncertainty about which date is valid. If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 3(a) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier.
perturbation.contradicted_text: (e) If THI does not make the obligatory payments as stated in 3(a) by the dates stated, the Exclusive License will revert back to Premier, provided, however, that in such event, THI would still be entitled to a proportionate interest in any Covid-19 Licensed Products, such portion being equal to a fraction, the numerator of which shall be the actual amount paid and the denominator of which shall be $2,000,000.

perturbation.original_text: Marv shall be reimbursed in full for the cost(s) of all legal expenses associated with this agreement by THI.
perturbation.changed_text: Marv shall be reimbursed up to $5,000 for the cost(s) of all legal expenses associated with this agreement by THI.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction regarding the extent of THI's obligation to reimburse Marv's legal expenses. Initially, it was a full reimbursement, but now it's capped at $5,000. This contradicts the overarching principle established in Section 9 regarding Materiality, which states, 'The Parties agree and stipulate that each and every term and condition contained in this Agreement is material...', creating ambiguity and conflicting obligations.
perturbation.contradicted_text: MATERIALITY. The Parties agree and stipulate that each and every term and condition contained in this Agreement is material, and that each and every term and condition may be reasonably accomplished within the time limitations, and in the manner set forth in this Agreement. The Parties agree and stipulate that time is of the essence with respect to compliance with each and every item set forth in this Agreement.
